fields.label: Layout
fields.name: site_layout
fields.instructions: Select Boxed, Wide or Full Width layout.

fields.label: Background Attachment
fields.name: body_bg_attachment
fields.instructions:
Scroll: The background scrolls along with the element.
Fixed: The background is fixed with regard to the viewport.

fields.label: Cover Background Size?
fields.name: body_bg_cover
fields.message: Scale the background image to be as large as possible so that the background area is completely covered by the background image. Some parts of the background image may not be in view within the background positioning area.

fields.label: Home
fields.name: home
fields.instructions:
Place settings:
Setting -> Reading -> Front page displays -> Your latest posts.
Front Page or Your latest posts. Go to Settings -> Reading.

fields.instructions: Most search engines use a maximum of 60 chars for the home title.

fields.label: Home description

fields.instructions: Most search engines use a maximum of 160 chars for the home description.

fields.label: Home keywords
fields.name: seo_home_keywords
fields.instructions: (comma separated)

fields.label: Og title
fields.name: og_home_title
fields.instructions: Most search engines use a maximum of 60 chars for the home title.

fields.label: OG description
fields.name: og_home_description
fields.instructions: Most search engines use a maximum of 250 chars for the home description.

fields.label: Top
fields.name: hook_top
fields.instructions:
theme_top

Executes after the opening <body> tag

fields.label: Content before
fields.name: hook_content_before
fields.instructions:
theme_content_before

Executes before the opening <content> tag

fields.label: Content after
fields.name: hook_content_after
fields.instructions:
theme_content_after

Executes after the closing </content> tag

fields.label: Bottom
fields.name: hook_bottom
fields.instructions:
theme_bottom

Executes after the closing </body> tag
